comments.body: See my comment above, the client actually sends these nested inside a `"metals"` key.

Adding more details to this.

I strongly suspect there's no agreement on how clients will send this.
I'm sure VSCode will wrap the settings in `metals`, but by reading the code I don't think Atom does the same. It looks like it will send them wrapped in `settings`.

@laughedelic I don't have Atom on my machine. If you have a minute, can you confirm which format Atom uses for configuration?

Right, Atom wraps it in `settings`:

https://github.com/atom/atom-languageclient/blob/cc8975d70c7e93b3d017ad7454635bb14f9439ac/lib/auto-languageclient.ts#L340-L342

And there is a hook to transform the configuration object before sending it to the server:

https://github.com/atom/atom-languageclient/blob/cc8975d70c7e93b3d017ad7454635bb14f9439ac/lib/auto-languageclient.ts#L220-L228
